General.Name: Inhwa Precision Co. Ltd
General.Description: Inhwa Precision Co., Ltd manufactures and sells ship engine parts in South Korea, rest of Asia, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company offers marine engine parts, such as cylinder covers and frames, bed plates, frame boxes, base frames, and medium speed engine base frames; and machinery facilities and suspension bridge parts. It also provides wire rod machines; power generation equipment parts; automotive parts, such as bevel gears and cages, cvjoint cage, and diff gears; wet drawer, twister, and winder products; heat exchangers for boilers, pressure vessels, and heat recovery steam generators; and bogie frames for railway vehicle drives, as well as engages in the real estate development business. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Changwon-si, South Korea.
